name: Warm Brie Cheese Dip
author: Kim Carnahan
summary: Brie's nutty flavor and creamy texture is perfectly complemented by this simple yet sumptuous warm dip. I served this at a Christmas party and even the non-Brie-lovers enjoyed it. The flavor of Brie is more subtle than usual because of the other ingredients, but it still is enjoyable for Brie fans.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Remove and discard rind from Brie
Slice cheese into about 12 pieces and place in a microwave-safe bowl
Microwave at 50% power, stirring every 45 seconds, until all ingredients are melted together
Transfer to a small (2-cup) oven-proof baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until dip is bubbly at the edges, 15 to 20 minutes
